name: BANSHEE The Game and Feature Film
blurb: A multiplayer horror game and independent film where you can play as human or spirit. Scream. Run. Die.

rewards.reward: SPECIAL THANKS from the Banshee team on our website, we'll send you updates on the project and the satisfaction of making our game a reality.
EARLY BETA ACCESS to the game. Ability to reserve your in-game name before anyone else. Plus special thanks from the team on the website, updates and GAME CURRENCY worth \u00a310.
KICKSTARTER ONLY PREMIUM SKINS. These will be awesome. Plus thanks, updates, early beta access and game currency worth \u00a320.

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL. You get a UNIQUE SIGNED PIECE OF CONCEPT ART with a personalised message. Plus all the \u00a320 rewards: KICKSTARTER ONLY PREMIUM SKINS, thanks, updates, early beta access and game currency worth \u00a320.

LIMITED EDITION SIGNED POSTERS. These will be personalized with your name. Only you and Banshee team members will have these. Plus, thanks, updates, early beta access, Kickstarter only premium skins and game currency worth \u00a325.
DIGITAL ARTBOOK OF THE GAME ART and a download of the ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK. Plus, thanks, updates, early beta access, Kickstarter only premium skins and game currency worth \u00a335.

BECOME A COLLECTABLE MISSING PERSON in the game with a police sketch of your face, plus SIGNED CONCEPT ART. Plus a digital artbook of the game art and a download of the original soundtrack, thanks, updates, early beta access, Kickstarter only premium skins and game currency worth \u00a350.

KICKSTARTER 'TAUNT' ABILITY. Gain the ability to hurl taunts at other players in the game. Also, WRITE AN AD FOR A NEWSPAPER in the game. Plus a digital artbook of the game art and a download of the original soundtrack, thanks, updates, early beta access, Kickstarter only premium skins and game currency worth \u00a350.

NAME A LOCATION IN THE GAME AFTER YOURSELF. Also you will have the TRANSPORT ABILITY TO TAKE YOU HOME to your location whenever you wish. Plus, Kickstarter 'taunt' ability a digital artbook of the game art and a download of the original soundtrack, thanks, updates, early beta access, Kickstarter only premium skins and game currency worth \u00a350.

HAVE YOUR SCREAM feature in the game and film. Have a COMPLETELY CUSTOM-MADE SKIN by our designer. VISIT THE BANSHEE FILM SET (travel not included) and get a CREW T-SHIRT. Get an ASSOCIATE PRODUCER CREDIT in the film and game.  Plus, Kickstarter 'taunt' ability, a digital artbook of the game art and a download of the original soundtrack, thanks, updates, early beta access, Kickstarter only premium skins and game currency worth \u00a350.

BANSHEE SCRIPT pages with DIRECTOR'S NOTES. EXECUTIVE PRODUCER CREDITS in FILM and GAME. Very limited edition Banshee GEEKYFOOT DESIGNER SHOES. Plus a completely custom made skin from our designer, a visit to the Banshee film set (travel not included), including a crew t-shirt, Kickstarter 'taunt' ability, a digital artbook of the game art and a download of the original soundtrack, thanks, updates, early beta access, Kickstarter only premium skins and game currency worth \u00a350.

BE A SPEAKING CAMEO IN THE FILM. This is for ONE PERSON only. You will have a line in the film. Plus, Executive Producer credits in film and game, Very limited edition Banshee Geekyfoot designer shoes, a completely custom made skin from our designer, a visit to the Banshee film set (travel not included), including a crew t-shirt, Kickstarter 'taunt' ability, a digital artbook of the game art and a download of the original soundtrack, thanks, updates, early beta access, Kickstarter only premium skins and game currency worth \u00a350.
